data.name: 'A lot of very dirty people came here to take showers. was very surprised,'aid Zhou Guoqiang.
data.value: 周国强说：“很多脏兮兮的人来这里洗澡。一开始我对此非常吃惊。”

data.name: 'I slept in the waiting hall of the railway station and ferry terminal. In the daytime, I would pick up bottles, help assemble temporary stages or any other work I could find,' said Wu Xueli.
data.value: 吴学理说：“我曾不得不在火车站候车大厅和渡轮码头过夜。在白天，我只能通过捡瓶子、搭建脚手架或其他任何我能找到的工作来勉强度日。”

data.name: 'I spent all of my money and lost my ID and couldn't find a job,' he told us.
data.value: 他告诉我们：“我身无分文还弄丢了身份证，无法找到工作。”

data.name: -Wu Xueli
data.value: 吴学理

data.name: -Yang Qin
data.value: ——杨琴

data.name: A home and hope
data.value: 家与希望

data.name: After meeting him, I knew Wu Xueli would truly benefit from learning job skills in our communal setting. He was quiet but eager to learn and was always willing to work hard in the cafe. So, I was heartbroken when he disappeared in the craziness of our move.
data.value: 在第一次见到他后，我就深信吴学理能够在我们的中心学到受益终身的工作技能。他是个安静的人，但非常渴望学习并总是在我们的餐厅里努力工作。因此，在繁忙的搬迁过程中失去与他的联系让我深感遗憾

data.name: Although this is a big city, there are hardly any services for homeless people. The drop-in center is the only safe place for many of them. And the more we know about them, the more we can do! Some people are great candidates for our residential job program. Others need help getting medical care or applying for a new ID card. We are able to devote time, attention, and services to these people because of your investment in our work.
data.value: 即使在流落街头以前，这些人们的生活也十分艰苦。在他们与我们分享自己的故事时，我们希望与他们建立友谊。这对我们的工作非常重要。我们希望日新中心能提供更多的人性关怀与友谊，因为只有这样，我们才能帮助客人获得更美好、更健康的生活。

data.name: As you may remember, we asked for help to purchase a van in our last newsletter. Through many generous gifts, we were able to order it. The new vehicle will allow us to provide a shuttle service from the city center to our drop-in center, meeting a need for our most vulnerable elderly and disabled guests. It's thanks to your generosity that we could extend this service to a population that is often forgotten in Shanghai.
data.value: 也许您还记得，我们在之前的新闻通讯中提到希望买一辆面包车。在各位慷慨的资助下，我们终于实现了这个愿望。新的面包车能够让我们提供从市中心到活动中心的接送服务，满足老年和残疾朋友的需求。多亏了您的帮助，我们才有能力为这些上海街头最容易被遗忘的人们带来温暖和希望。

data.name: Before I was in the dust, but now I am over the sky.
data.value: 以前，我只是一粒不起眼的尘土，而现在，我幸福的像在天堂一样

data.name: Great things are unfolding at the Renewal Center! We just celebrated our first full year in our new location. It's been a whirlwind filled with new guests, returning friends and great successes.
data.value: 日新中心正在迎来一个又一个惊喜！我们刚刚庆祝了搬迁新址的一周年纪念日。在这天，我们开心地迎来了各位新客人，老朋友。

data.name: He came to the center after a homeless friend told him he could get a free meal, a shower, and do his laundry here. Since joining the job program, he’s gotten so much more than that.
data.value: 一位无家可归的朋友告诉他在日新中心可以得到一份免费的餐食，还可以免费洗澡和换洗衣物。因此他来到日新中心加入了我们的培训计划，并得到了比想象中更多的帮助。

data.name: He came to the Renewal Center hoping we could help him find work. When he found out about our residential job program, he knew it was a way to get his life back on track.
data.value: 他来到日新中心，希望我们能帮他找到工作。当他了解了我们的工作培训计划后，他知道这就是他开始新生的最佳机遇。

data.name: I did not know how to begin a new life, he said. That changed when Wei Jiazhen came to the Renewal Center. He wanted food and a shower but found more when he joined the job program. Wei Jiazhen loved the community at the center and liked serving others.
data.value: “我不知道如何开始新生活，”他这样说道。但当魏佳珍来到日新中心后，一切都变了。起初，他只是想要一些食物和洗个澡，但后来，他在工作培训计划中发现了更多生活的目标。魏佳真开始爱上了中心的生活，并乐于为其他人服务。

data.name: I wandered around during the day. At night,I'd sleep any place I could find, said Yang Qin.
data.value: 杨琴说：“我白天就在闲逛。到了晚上，我就睡在任何可以睡觉的地方。”

data.name: I will live my life positively, he said.
data.value: 他说：“我一定会积极地生活下去！”

data.name: In some ways, this is our favorite time of year. Guests are more likely to come and stay awhile. This gives us a chance to get to know them. Our volunteers and staff are here to provide basic services, but they're also here to help us build trust and relationships with our guests.
data.value: 从某方面来说，这是一年中我最喜欢的季节。因为这时会有更多人前来寻求帮助，这给了我们了解他们的机会。我们的志愿者和工作人员不但为我们提供最基础的服务，更为了帮助我们建立信任，从而更好地了解我们的客人。

data.name: It's not surprising that free showers, clothes, and food are a popular topic of conversation among Shanghai' s homeless. That's how Zhou Guoqiang, a 49-year-old man from Jiangsu Province, heard about our drop-in center.
data.value: 显而易见的，免费食物、洗澡和换洗衣物的服务是上海街头无家可归人士最需要的福利。这也是来自江苏省49岁的周国强对日新中心最初的了解。

data.name: Jimmy McWhinney Executive Director Hanson Ye Operations Director
data.value: 叶海生，项目运营总监 Jimmy McWhinney，筹募干事和项目顾问

data.name: Moving the Renewal Center to a new location has been great. But in the shuffle and set up, we unfortunately lost touch with one of our residential job program trainees, Wu Xueli.
data.value: 搬迁到新地址是日新中心的一件大喜事。但在繁忙的搬迁和重建过程中，我们遗憾地与一位工作培训计划学员失去了联系，他的名字叫吴学理。

data.name: Now our friend is building confidence and working towards independence. Wu Xueli has you to thank for that. Because of your support, he has found a home and hope in Shanghai.
data.value: 现在，我们内向的朋友正在努力获得自力更生的能力。吴学理要谢谢您的帮助。正是您的慷慨支持，让他在上海找到了家和希望。

data.name: Now, said Yang Qin,Without this place, my difficulties would have taken years to overcome or I might just be homeless forever.
data.value: 现在，杨琴认为：“如果没有日新中心，我可能需要花费许多年才能克服目前的困难，也可能永远生活在街头。”

data.name: Our job training program gives people a fresh start
data.value: 我们的工作培训计划给人们提供了全新的开始

data.name: Purposeless to purposeful
data.value: 从漫无目的到充满希望

data.name: Recently, he started a job at a teashop. Wei Jiazhen will have a steep learning curve, but he has shown himself to be an intelligent and kind young man.
data.value: 最近，他在一家茶馆开始了新的工作。虽然今后还有许多东西要学，但魏佳珍已经证明了自己是一个聪明又善良的年轻人。

data.name: Renewal is happening in Shanghai
data.value: 日新中心让上海焕然一新

data.name: Resourceful and hard-working, he does fairly well collecting recyclables to sell. Even so, he can't afford to rent a room. That's why Zhou Guoqiang is grateful he can come each week to take a shower and to get a change of clothes.
data.value: 与大部分无家可归人士不同的是，他的废品生意一直还不错。但即便如此，他还是付不起租房的房租。因为，周国强非常感激每周能够在日新中心洗澡和换洗衣物。

data.name: Smart, polite, and hardworking, he wants to open his own small business one day. We hope he'll join our job training program when he's ready!
data.value: 周国强是一个聪明、礼貌、努力工作的人，他希望有一天能够开始自己的小生意。我们希望他以后能加入我们的工作培训计划。

data.name: Taking stock for winter
data.value: 为过冬积累物资

data.name: Thankfully, I have good news! Your gifts gave us the resources to search for Wu Xueli. It took a few months, but we found him and he rejoined our residency program.
data.value: 谢天谢地，好消息终于来临！您的捐赠给我们提供的珍贵资源使我们最终找到了吴学理。虽然花费了几个月的时间，但我们最终还是联系到了他，并且他也重新加入了我们的培训计划。

data.name: Thanks to your contributions, Wu Xueli has a new purpose: to live his life positively.
data.value: 感谢您的资助，吴学理有了新的目标：积极地生活下去！

data.name: The days are getting shorter and cold here. That means we're expecting more guests to visit the drop-in center who need clothing to protect them against the freezing temperatures in January and February. Thanks to your gifts, we are beginning to prepare for the busy months ahead, but we still need more help to meet the high demand.
data.value: 上海的白天越来越短，气温也不断降低。这意味着我们将迎来更多无家可归人士。他们需要温暖的衣物来帮助他们抵御一二月份接近零度的严寒。在您慷慨捐赠的帮助下，我们正在为此做足准备。但要满足过冬的需求，我们仍然需要更多的资助。

data.name: The showers and clothing we provide are the first step to developing relationships with our guests. It's often damp, drizzling, or downright pouring during Shanghai's cold winters, so, they may spend days in clammy clothes even as the weather freezes. As you can imagine, socks, shoes, thermal underwear, and coats fly off our shelves.
data.value: 我们提供的衣物和洗澡服务只是与客人建立友谊的第一步。上海的冬天常常下雨，既潮湿又寒冷。因此，无家可归人士常常身着潮湿的衣服忍受着接近零度的严寒。可以想象，袜子、鞋子、保暖内衣和大衣等，都是我们最急缺的物资。

data.name: These men and women had hard lives even before they ended up on the streets. As they share their stories with us, we develop friendships with them. I can't tell you how important that is. We want the Renewal Center to be personal and relational because that is the only way we can help our guests live better, healthier lives.
data.value: 即使在流落街头以前，这些人们的生活也十分艰苦。在他们与我们分享自己的故事时，我们希望与他们建立友谊。这对我们的工作非常重要。我们希望日新中心能提供更多的人性关怀与友谊，因为只有这样，我们才能帮助客人获得更美好、更健康的生活。

data.name: These services are only available because of your generosity.Without the drop-in center, Zhou Guoqiang said,would feel desperate when times get hard.
data.value: 与大部分无家可归人士不同的是，他的废品生意一直还不错。但即便如此，他还是付不起租房的房租。因为，周国强非常感激每周能够在日新中心洗澡和换洗衣物。

data.name: These successes are only possible because of your partnership. Thank you for giving Wei Jiazhen and Yang Qin the chance to become productive members of society.
data.value: 这些成功的故事都要感谢您的无私捐赠。谢谢您给魏佳珍和杨勤提供了成为对社会有用之人的机会。

data.name: This opportunity has been life changing for Wu Xueli. He first came to Shanghai to see the lights of the city, but he ended up living on the streets and was too ashamed to return to his home in Chongqing.
data.value: 这对于吴学理来说是一次改变一生的机会。第一次到上海时，他只是想来看看这个繁华的大都市，但后来却不幸流落街头。深感惭愧的他没脸回到远在重庆的家乡。

data.name: Unlike most of our guests, Wei Jiazhen grew up in Shanghai, but he felt out of place with his family and ended up aimless and bored. He wasted his days sleeping or hanging out at internet cafes.
data.value: 和我们的多数客人不同，魏佳珍在上海长大。但他感到与自己的家庭格格不入，进而终日无所事事。他开始浪费光阴，不是睡觉就是在网吧混日子。

data.name: Until then, Zhou Guoqiang is among the many guests for whom we can provide basic life needs. As winter approaches, there will be even more homeless coming for help. Every dollar you give enables us to keep providing these vital services.
data.value: 包括周国强，我们为许多无家可归人士提供最基本的生活需求。而随着冬天的来临，将有越来越多的人前来寻求帮助。您捐赠的每一笔资金都能帮我们提供更多这些珍贵的服务。

data.name: We are helping the marginalized and forgotten thanks to your support
data.value: 感谢您的支持，让我们能够帮助那些被遗忘的人们

data.name: We've also been able to reconnect with old friends like Wu Xueli (page 1) and ramp up our residential job training program (opposite page). Thank you for being a part of this exciting and life-giving work. It truly makes a difference in so many lives.
data.value: 此外，我们还重新找到了吴学理（首页）等一些失去联系的老朋友，重新启动了我们的工作培训计划。感谢每一位参与这一慈善事业的朋友。你们的支持真的改变了许多人的生命。

data.name: When it came time to find a job, Yang Qin took the initiative and found work at a restaurant on Huaihai Road, one of the most posh avenues in our city. We are so proud of Yang Qin. He's also come a long way with his family.
data.value: 最终，杨琴通过自己的努力，在淮海路上的一家餐厅找到了工作。能够在上海最繁华的大街上找到工作，我们替他感到无比自豪。与此同时，他和家人的关系也逐渐好转。

data.name: Will you help stock our closet during this critical time of year? We are in need of clothing donations from those of you living in Shanghai, and we can always use more financial support to meet winter's needs. These gifts can mean life and health for our guests. Thank you for considering this need. We are so grateful for all that you do to keep the Renewal Center and our guests thriving!
data.value: 您是否能够帮助我们为这一关键时期囤积足够的物资？我们急需捐赠者捐助的衣物，同时也需要更多的资金来满足冬季的其他需求。这些捐赠关系到我们客人的生命和健康，所以我们在此特别感谢您对我们的支持，感谢您慷慨的捐赠让日新中心和所有需要帮助的无家可归人士能够坚持下来！

data.name: Without this place, my difficulties would have taken years to overcome or I might just be homeless forever.
data.value: 如果没有日新中心，我可能需要花费许多年才能克服目前的困难，也可能永远生活在街头。

data.name: Yang Qin has found purpose as he has learned important job skills.
data.value: 在学会了重要的工作技能后，杨琴找到了生活的目标。

data.name: Your contributions have given Wu Xueli a second chance
data.value: 您的资助给了吴学理重生的机会

data.name: Your donations have also helped Wei Jiazhen make a fresh start.
data.value: 您的资助也帮助魏佳珍开启了新生活。

data.name: Your gifts give hardworking homeless people a place to clean up
data.value: 您的捐赠为无家可归人士提供了洗澡的地方

data.name: Your gifts have given Yang Qin the confidence to find a job on his own.
data.value: 您的捐赠给了杨琴找工作的自信

data.name: Your gifts provide nourishment and warmth to the homeless
data.value: 您的捐赠为无家可归人士带来了食物与温暖

data.name: Zhou Guoqiang couldn't believe that we really welcomed the homeless, but visited the center in 2011 and has been a guest ever since.
data.value: 周国强起初并不相信我们真的会欢迎无家可归人士。但从2011年首次访问中心以来，他就成了我们的老朋友。

data.name: Zhou Guoqiang enjoys a hot bowl of noodles during one of his weekly visits.
data.value: 周国强每周来到日新中心一次。在您的资助下，他可以享受一碗热腾腾的面条，在严寒之中得到温暖，并清洗自己的衣服.

data.name: “I’d like to work for two years and then start some kind of small business or sell vegetables,” he said. “I’d like to make some money and return home and build a house.”
data.value: 他说：“我打算在这里工作两年，然后开始做点小生意，或者去卖菜。我希望能存些钱，然后回到家乡盖一座房子。”

data.name: Home
data.value: 主页

data.name: Yang Qin came to Shanghai looking for work and escaping a difficult home life in Hubei Province. Months passed and he couldn't a find a job. Then he ran out of money and options.
data.value: 为了告别家乡湖北困难的生活，杨琴来到上海希望找到新的工作。几个月过去了，他仍未找到工作。身上的钱花光后，他不得不流落街头

data.name: In this issue of Re:news
data.value: 刊物内容

data.name: The Friend Network
data.value: 日新中心的朋友网络
